issue.title: Switch from rubble plugin to manual placement

content.raw: Btw why don't you simply start a world using the rubble plugin, wait for rubble to come to rest (and manually fix buggy rubble / interpenetrations where needed), and then save the world? You need predefined worlds for the VRC so launching randomized worlds each run wouldn't be an option anyway.
content.html: Btw why don't you simply start a world using the rubble plugin, wait for rubble to come to rest (and manually fix buggy rubble / interpenetrations where needed), and then save the world?
